verses.text: \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, however, took \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w complete|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w construction|strong="H1129"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w House|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* cubits \w long|strong="H5921"\w*, \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* cubits \w high|strong="H6967"\w*,\f + \fr 7:2 \ft The house was approximately 150 feet long, 75 feet wide, and 45 feet high (45.7 meters long, 22.9 meters wide, and 13.7 meters high).\f* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* four \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w cedar|strong="H6967"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* supporting \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cedar|strong="H6967"\w* \w beams|strong="H3773"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* house \w was|strong="H5982"\w* roofed \w with|strong="H5921"\w* cedar \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w beams|strong="H6763"\w* \w that|strong="H6763"\w* rested \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*—forty-five \w beams|strong="H6763"\w*, \w fifteen|strong="H2568"\w* per \w row|strong="H2905"\w*.

There \w were|strong="H7969"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H2905"\w* high \w windows|strong="H8261"\w* facing one another \w in|strong="H6471"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tiers.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w doorways|strong="H6607"\w* \f + \fr 7:5 \ft Literally doorways and doorposts\f* \w had|strong="H7969"\w* rectangular \w frames|strong="H8260"\w*, \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w openings|strong="H6607"\w* facing \w one|strong="H3605"\w* another \w in|strong="H6607"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* tiers.

Solomon \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* colonnade \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* cubits \w long|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*,\f + \fr 7:6 \ft The colonnade was approximately 75 feet long and 45 feet wide (22.9 meters long and 13.7 meters wide).\f* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* portico \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* canopy \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* portico.

\w In|strong="H6213"\w* addition, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w built|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hall \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Hall \w of|strong="H3678"\w* \w Justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*. \w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H6213"\w* \w paneled|strong="H5603"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* cedar \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w floor|strong="H7172"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* ceiling.\f + \fr 7:7 \ft Syriac and Vulgate; Hebrew from floor to floor\f*

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w would|strong="H6213"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w*, \w set|strong="H3427"\w* further \w back|strong="H3947"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* similar construction. \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w hall|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, whom \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w buildings|strong="H1004"\w* \w were|strong="H1419"\w* constructed \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w costly|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*, \w cut|strong="H1496"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w size|strong="H4060"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* trimmed \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w saws|strong="H4050"\w* \w inside|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foundation|strong="H4527"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* eaves, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3245"\w* \w foundations|strong="H3245"\w* \w were|strong="H1419"\w* \w laid|strong="H3245"\w* \w with|strong="H6235"\w* \w large|strong="H1419"\w*, \w costly|strong="H3368"\w* stones, some \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* cubits \w long|strong="H1419"\w* \f + \fr 7:10 \ft 10 cubits is approximately 15 feet or 4.6 meters.\f* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* some \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* cubits \w long|strong="H1419"\w*.\f + \fr 7:10 \ft 8 cubits is approximately 12 feet or 3.7 meters.\f*

\w Above|strong="H4605"\w* \w these|strong="H4605"\w* \w were|strong="H4605"\w* high-grade \w stones|strong="H1496"\w*, \w cut|strong="H1496"\w* \w to|strong="H4605"\w* \w size|strong="H4060"\w*, \w and|strong="H4605"\w* cedar beams.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w surrounded|strong="H5439"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* dressed \w stone|strong="H1496"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* trimmed cedar \w beams|strong="H3773"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w courtyard|strong="H2691"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* portico \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. The Pillars and Capitals (2 Chronicles 3:14–17)

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w bring|strong="H3947"\w* Huram \f + \fr 7:13 \ft Hebrew Hiram, a variant of Huram; also in verses 40 and 45; see 2 Chronicles 4:11. Note that this is not Hiram king of Tyre mentioned in 1 Kings 5:1.\f* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* widow \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* craftsman \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*. Huram \w had|strong="H8010"\w* \w great|strong="H6213"\w* \w skill|strong="H2451"\w*, \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* kind \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w carried|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*.

\w He|strong="H8147"\w* \w cast|strong="H6696"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*, \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* cubits \w high|strong="H6967"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* cubits \w in|strong="H5437"\w* \w circumference|strong="H5437"\w*.\f + \fr 7:15 \ft Each pillar was approximately 27 feet high and 18 feet in circumference (8.2 meters high and 5.5 meters in circumference).\f*

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w capitals|strong="H3805"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w capital|strong="H3805"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*.\f + \fr 7:16 \ft 5 cubits is approximately 7.5 feet or 2.3 meters.\f*

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w capitals|strong="H3805"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H4639"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w network|strong="H7639"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w lattice|strong="H7639"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w wreaths|strong="H1434"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w chainwork|strong="H4639"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* each \w capital|strong="H3805"\w*.\f + \fr 7:17 \ft Hebrew; LXX one for each capital\f*

\w Likewise|strong="H3651"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w each|strong="H5439"\w* grating \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w each|strong="H5439"\w* \w capital|strong="H3805"\w* \w atop|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w capitals|strong="H3805"\w* \w atop|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* portico \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w shaped|strong="H4639"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*, four cubits \w high|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 7:19 \ft 4 cubits is approximately 6 feet or 1.8 meters; also in verse 38.\f*

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w capitals|strong="H3805"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*, \w just|strong="H5980"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rounded projection \w next|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w network|strong="H7639"\w*, \w were|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* encircling \w each|strong="H5439"\w* \w capital|strong="H3805"\w*.

Thus \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w at|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* portico \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*. \w The|strong="H7121"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w south|strong="H3233"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*,\f + \fr 7:21 \ft Jachin probably means He establishes.\f* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* north \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w Boaz|strong="H1162"\w*.\f + \fr 7:21 \ft Boaz probably means in Him is strength.\f*

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tops|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w shaped|strong="H4639"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*. \w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w was|strong="H7218"\w* \w completed|strong="H8552"\w*. The Molten Sea (2 Chronicles 4:1–5)

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w of|strong="H8193"\w* cast \w metal|strong="H6213"\w*. \w It|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H6967"\w* \w circular|strong="H5696"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* shape, measuring \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w rim|strong="H8145"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w rim|strong="H8145"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, \w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w cubits|strong="H2568"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w circumference|strong="H5437"\w*.\f + \fr 7:23 \ft The Sea was approximately 15 feet from rim to rim, 7.5 feet in height, and 45 feet in circumference (4.6 meters from rim to rim, 2.3 meters in height, and 13.7 meters in circumference).\f*

\w Below|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w rim|strong="H8193"\w*, ornamental buds \w encircled|strong="H5437"\w* \w it|strong="H5439"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* per cubit \w all|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* way \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w cast|strong="H3332"\w* \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* \w as|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* part \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w facing|strong="H6437"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w facing|strong="H6437"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w facing|strong="H6437"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w facing|strong="H6437"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sea|strong="H3220"\w* rested \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hindquarters \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* center.

It \w was|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w handbreadth|strong="H2947"\w* \w thick|strong="H5672"\w*,\f + \fr 7:26 \ft A handbreadth is approximately 2.9 inches or 7.4 centimeters.\f* \w and|strong="H4639"\w* its \w rim|strong="H8193"\w* \w was|strong="H8193"\w* fashioned \w like|strong="H7799"\w* \w the|strong="H3557"\w* \w brim|strong="H8193"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*, \w like|strong="H7799"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lily|strong="H7799"\w* \w blossom|strong="H6525"\w*. It \w could|strong="H8193"\w* \w hold|strong="H3557"\w* \w two|strong="H3557"\w* thousand \w baths|strong="H1324"\w*.\f + \fr 7:26 \ft 2,000 baths is approximately 11,600 gallons or 44,000 liters; LXX does not include this sentence.\f* The Ten Bronze Stands

\w In|strong="H6213"\w* addition, \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* movable \w stands|strong="H4350"\w* \w of|strong="H7341"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*, each \w four|strong="H7969"\w* cubits long, \w four|strong="H7969"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* cubits \w high|strong="H6967"\w*.\f + \fr 7:27 \ft The stands were approximately 6 feet in length and width, and 4.5 feet high (1.8 meters in length and width, and 1.4 meters high).\f*

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H2088"\w* \w design|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H2088"\w* \w stands|strong="H4350"\w*: \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H4350"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w* panels attached \w to|strong="H1992"\w* uprights,

Additionally, Huram \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* pots,\f + \fr 7:40 \ft Many Hebrew manuscripts, LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate (see also verse 45 and 2 Chronicles 4:11); many other Hebrew manuscripts basins\f* \w shovels|strong="H3257"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sprinkling \w bowls|strong="H4219"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* Huram \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* undertaken \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:
the two pillars; the two bowl-shaped capitals atop the pillars; the two sets of network covering both bowls of the capitals atop the pillars;
the four hundred pomegranates for the two sets of network (two rows of pomegranates for each network covering both the bowl-shaped capitals atop the pillars);
the ten stands; the ten basins on the stands;
the Sea; the twelve oxen underneath the Sea;

and the pots, shovels, and sprinkling bowls. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* Huram \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* burnished \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*.
